item.title: Sources: Hoosiers DC Haines gets lucrative deal
item.description: Indiana has reached an agreement with defensive coordinator Bryant Haines that will make him one of the nation's highest-paid assistants, sources conf...

item.title: Messi statue event in India marred by fan unrest
item.description: Lionel Messi's "GOAT Tour" of India was marred by chaotic scenes on Saturday after fans threw ripped up seats and invaded the pitch.

item.title: Sources: Sellers finalizing return to South Carolina
item.description: South Carolina quarterback LaNorris Sellers is nearing a deal to return to the school for 2026, sources told ESPN's Pete Thamel.

item.title: Sources: Bears optimistic Odunze will return Sun.
item.description: Bears are optimistic wide receiver Rome Odunze will play against the Cleveland Browns on Sunday, sources told ESPN's Jeremy Fowler.

item.title: SGA: Thunder 'absolutely' want NBA wins record
item.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander says the Thunder are after every trophy or record they can obtain, including the NBA's record of 73 wins.
